name: logging/status
description: Show current logging configuration for all personas or a specific persona

params.name: persona
params.description: Specific persona to show status for. If not specified, shows all personas

results.name: personas
results.description: Array of persona logging statuses with { persona, enabled, categories }

results.name: defaultEnabled
results.description: Default enabled state for unconfigured personas

examples.expectedResult: { personas: [...], systemEnabled: true, defaultEnabled: false, summary: '2/11 personas logging enabled' }
{ personas: [{ persona: 'helper', enabled: true, categories: ['cognition'] }], summary: 'helper: ON (cognition)' }
